newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Tractebel wins nuclear waste contracts.
newsitem.headline: Tractebel wins nuclear waste contracts.

text.p: Belgian utility holding company Tractebel SA said on Thursday its engineering unit recently won four contracts for the processing and storage of radioactive waste in Russia and Central Europe.
It said the contracts were funded by the European Commission and awarded on the basis of the group's experience in similar nuclear waste storage operations in Belgium.

It said Tractebel Engineering, one of the group's seven business units, already played a prominent role in the European Commission's PHARE and TACIS programmes aimed at improving the safety of nuclear intallations.
